結構方程式模型，

```{r message=FALSE}
library(lavaan)
library(semPlot)
```


```{r lavaan}
HS.model <- ' visual  =~ x1 + x2 + x3 
              textual =~ x4 + x5 + x6
              speed   =~ x7 + x8 + x9 '
fit <- cfa(HS.model, data=HolzingerSwineford1939)
```

```{r}
summary(fit, fit.measures=TRUE)
```

```{r}
semPaths(fit)
```
